vote.title: Authorize the dedication of $475,000.00 in Oak Cliff Gateway TIF funds from the available District-Wide Set-Aside to support the operations and maintenance of the Dallas Streetcar for FY 2020-2021 - Not to exceed $475,000.00 - Financing: Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Fund (subject to current and future appropriations from tax increments) (This item was remanded back to the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee)
